comment.language: On the Feast of the Annunciation:
On the Feast of the Annunciation:

text.language: V/e~taf[icarx qen ]paryenoc: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
who was incarnate of the Virgin. Save us and have mercy on us.
yang telah inkarnasi dari Perawan. Selamatkanlah dan kasihanilah kami.
الذي تجسد من العذراء. خَلِّصْنا وارحَمْنا.
